tab1Body.title: Creá tu cuenta
tab1Body.description: Con tu R.U.C y cuenta bancaria podés empezar inmediatamente. Sin complicaciones ni requisitos adicionales.
tab1Body.icon:
<svg class="w-full h-full text-green-600 badge-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor">
                <path class="morph-path-clock-normal" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M12 8v4l3 3m6-3a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"/>
                <path class="opacity-0 morph-path-clock-active" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M12 6v6l4 2m-4-8a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"/>
            </svg>

tab1Body.title: Subí tu factura
tab1Body.description: Cargá tu factura electrónica y datos adicionales del cliente desde cualquier dispositivo.
tab1Body.icon:
<svg class="w-full h-full text-green-600 badge-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor">
                <path class="morph-path-computer" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M9.75 17L9 20l-1 1h8l-1-1-.75-3M3 13h18M5 17h14a2 2 0 002-2V5a2 2 0 00-2-2H5a2 2 0 00-2 2v10a2 2 0 002 2z"/>
                <path class="opacity-0 morph-path-cloud" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 16a4 4 0 01-.88-7.903A5 5 0 1115.9 6L16 6a5 5 0 011 9.9M15 13l-3-3m0 0l-3 3m3-3v12"/>
            </svg>

tab1Body.title: Recibí el adelanto
tab1Body.description: Publicá tu factura y esperá la financiación de un inversor verificado en nuestra plataforma.
tab1Body.icon:
<svg class="w-full h-full text-green-600 badge-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor">
                <path class="morph-path-calendar" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M8 7V3m8 4V3m-9 8h10M5 21h14a2 2 0 002-2V7a2 2 0 00-2-2H5a2 2 0 00-2 2v12a2 2 0 002 2z"/>
                <path class="opacity-0 morph-path-money" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M12 8c-1.657 0-3 .895-3 2s1.343 2 3 2 3 .895 3 2-1.343 2-3 2m0-8c1.11 0 2.08.402 2.599 1M12 8V7m0 1v8m0 0v1m0-1c-1.11 0-2.08-.402-2.599-1"/>
            </svg>

tab2Body.title: Creá tu cuenta
tab2Body.description: Registrate como inversor con tu cuenta bancaria y define tu perfil de inversión.
tab2Body.icon:
<svg class="w-full h-full text-green-600 badge-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor">
                <path class="morph-path-check" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M5 13l4 4L19 7"/>
                <path class="opacity-0 morph-path-arrow" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M13 7l5 5-5 5M8 7l5 5-5 5"/>
            </svg>

tab2Body.title: Elegí una factura
tab2Body.description: Seleccioná facturas en nuestro marketplace que se ajusten a tu rentabilidad deseada.

tab2Body.title: Generá ingresos
tab2Body.description: Inverí tu capital y recibí ingresos cuando se cobre la factura. Diversificá tu portafolio con facturas de diferentes empresas.
tab2Body.icon:
<svg class="w-full h-full text-green-600 badge-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor">
                <path class="morph-path-chart" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M13 7h8m0 0v8m0-8l-8 8-4-4-6 6"/>
                <path class="opacity-0 morph-path-roi-money" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M12 8c-1.657 0-3 .895-3 2s1.343 2 3 2 3 .895 3 2-1.343 2-3 2m0-8c1.11 0 2.08.402 2.599 1M12 8V7m0 1v8m0 0v1m0-1c-1.11 0-2.08-.402-2.599-1"/>
            </svg>
